pageContext.quote: Keep in mind that it isn’t the one who has it in for you and takes aswipe that harms you, but rather the harm comes from your own beliefabout the abuse. So when someone arouses your anger, know that it’s reallyyour own opinion fueling it. Instead, make it your first response not tobe carried away by such impressions, for with time and distanceself-mastery is more easily achieved.
